channel.title: Need help with passwords
channel.description:
ok on my server when i go into charaters and look at the passwords it come up like this
[ACCOUNT] character-username = blah blah blah character-password = 170-34-104-28-117-97-204-230-224-4-47-111-46-53-191-103
just wondering how do i chang it so it comes up like
[ACCOUNT] character-username = blah blah blah character-password = password
with letters not numbers my friend wants his password changed and i cand do it because ya idk what the numbers mean? or is their a way to tell what the numbers mean?

item.title: Need help with passwords
item.dc:creator: @Divine1 Divine
item.description:
@Divine1 wrote:

well his brother keeps gettin on it and banning everyone hes co-owner and he had like a mass bann of 30 people yesterday so he only needs to change the pass word hes trying to put a password protection the file so his brother can get into it but how can i change his pass can i just delete the numbers and put letters or will that mess his account up?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with passwords
item.dc:creator: @ChrisZ ChrisZ
item.description:
@ChrisZ wrote:

you can change the numbers to just the pw…

if it sais (s)hes alreaddy online then its bye bye for his/her account…

(s)he needs to make a new account…

but try the first one first

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with passwords
item.dc:creator: @Divine1 Divine
item.description:
@Divine1 wrote:

k well thats kinda hard to do when im the admin of my server so why would i want to steal other peoples accounts that play on my server? also is their another that he can change his pass word? or that he can do by him self?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with passwords
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

Its crypted to prevent account stealing like you probally were about to do.

Read full topic
